component.name: Shutter Encoder
component.summary: A converter designed by video editors

description.p: List of Functions: – Without conversion: Cut without re-encoding, Replace audio, Rewrap, Conform, Merge, Extract, Subtitling, Video inserts – Sound conversions: WAV, AIFF, FLAC, ALAC, MP3, AAC, AC3, OPUS, Vorbis, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby TrueHD – Editing codecs: DNxHD, DNxHR, Apple ProRes, QT Animation, GoPro CineForm, Uncompressed – Output codecs: H.264, H.265, H.266, VP8, VP9, AV1 – Broadcast codecs: XDCAM HD422, AVC-Intra 100, XAVC, HAP – Old codecs: Theora, MPEG-2, MJPEG, Xvid, DV PAL, WMV, MPEG-1 – Archiving codec: FFV1 – Images creation: JPEG, Image – Burn & Rip: DVD, Blu-ray, DVD RIP – Analysis: Loudness & True Peak, Audio normalization, Cut detection, Black detection, Media offline detection, VMAF – Download: Web video
